text: Aleksandr Sergeyevich Kozlov (; 19 March 1993 – 15 July 2022) was a Russian professional football player. He began playing for the Russian Premier League in 2010 for FC Spartak Moscow. Kozlov was born in Moscow, Russia. He was playing for FC Aluston-YUBK Alushta at the time of his death. He was also known for playing with FC Okzhetpes in 2017. Kozlov died in Moscow on 15 July 2022 from a blood clot at the age of 29.Умер Александр Козлов ==References== Category:1993 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Deaths from blood clot
title: Aleksandr Kozlov (footballer)
